news.title: Nvidia takes $2 billion stake in Synopsys with expanded computing power partnership
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: Eli Lilly cuts cash prices of Zepbound weight loss drug vials on direct-to-consumer site
news.summary: The announcement comes weeks after President Donald Trump inked deals with Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to make their GLP-1 drugs easier for Americans to access.

news.title: Airbus shares fall as much as 10% on reports of new quality issue on dozens of A320 aircraft
news.summary: Shares of Airbus plunged to the bottom of the pan-European Stoxx 600 index on Monday morning. Airbus is the world's largest maker of airliners and one of the biggest suppliers to Boeing.

news.title: Intel stock holds 10% rise after analyst predicts major Apple deal
news.summary: Intel's share price was down slightly premarket after a 10% spike on Friday. Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said the chip giant was nearing a deal to supply Apple.

news.title: An industry focused on death faces an existential crisis
news.summary: Family run companies that make traditional memorialization products like gravestones are facing the dual challenges of tariffs and cremation. The small, family run companies make gravestones, headstones and other memorials.

news.title: ‘It’s expensive feeding and housing a family of 7’: I’m 41 with $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs?
news.summary: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits,” he says. “I’m very lucky. I’ve been through a lot.”

news.title: Could ‘Stranger Things’ become the next ‘Star Wars’–style franchise? The Netflix show has already earned $1 billion.
news.summary: The series has gone from being a quirky show, rooted in ’80s-era pop culture, into a global phenomenon. But it all comes down to what else Netflix can develop.

news.title: My brother has fallen on hard times. My sister wants to buy his house. Is that a good idea?
news.summary: “She will let him live in it free of charge and continue to take care of the maintenance,” his wife says. “She’s a very generous woman,’ she adds.

news.title: A320 troubles send Airbus shares to their worst day in a year
news.summary: Airbus has already disclosed problems impacting over 6,000 aircraft. Airbus had already disclosed issues impacting more than 6,500 aircraft. The problems are expected to be fixed within the next few months.

news.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
news.summary: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for,” the driver said.
